src:
浅間山の噴火警戒レベル、１に引き下げ…気象庁

06 Nov 2019, 05:23

　気象庁は６日午後２時、群馬・長野県境の浅間山の噴火警戒レベルを２（火口周辺規制）から１（活火山であることに留意）に引き下げた。火口から５００メートルを超える範囲に影響を及ぼす噴火の可能性が低くなったため。
　８月２６日に小規模噴火が発生したが、火山性地震は１０月上旬から少ない状態で経過し、深部からのマグマ上昇を示す地殻変動は観測されていないという。
text:
Asama eruption alert level lowered to 1 ... Japan Meteorological Agency

06 Nov 2019, 05:23

The Meteorological Agency lowered the eruption warning level of Mt. Asama on the border of Gunma and Nagano Prefecture from 2 (regulation around the crater) to 1 (note that it is an active volcano) on the 6th. The possibility of an eruption affecting the area over 500 meters from the crater has decreased.
A small-scale eruption occurred on August 26, but the volcanic earthquake has been in a low state since the beginning of October, and no crustal deformation indicating a magma rise from the deep part has been observed.
